metadata.Title: CVE-2021-28165 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Eclipse Jetty 7.2.2 to 9.4.38, 10.0.0.alpha0 to 10.0.1, and 11.0.0.alpha0 to 11.0.1, CPU usage can reach 100% upon receiving a large invalid TLS frame.

criterions.comment: equinox-bundles: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
